name: Plasma Rifle MK-7
description: Standard issue energy weapon with high rate of fire and moderate damage. Effective at medium range with excellent accuracy.

name: Railgun Sniper
description: Electromagnetic precision weapon capable of penetrating heavy armor. One-shot potential against most targets.

name: Scatter Cannon
description: Close-range devastation tool firing multiple projectiles. Devastating at point-blank range.

name: Arc Pistol
description: Reliable backup weapon with chain lightning capability. Can hit multiple targets in close proximity.

name: Frag Grenade
description: Standard fragmentation explosive with wide damage radius. Effective against groups of enemies.

name: EMP Device
description: Electromagnetic pulse generator that disables robotic enemies and shields temporarily.
